The {Niche} industry is on fire.

1. {Stat1}

But it‚Äôs not until you break each of these stats down that you realize how quickly the {Niche} industry is really growing:
1. {Stat1}
This is an impressive stat at face value.
But what‚Äôs 10x more impressive is {SecondaryStat}.
That‚Äôs {X} times bigger than {ComparableIndustry}.
This is a signal of where things might be headed.
2. {Stat2}
The last time an industry saw growth like this, it was in {Date} when {Niche} was {Outcome}.
I‚Äôm betting the same thing will happen again here.
3. {Stat3}
As if the above wasn‚Äôt impressive enough, this stat is just mind-boggling.
To give you a sense of how big that is, that‚Äôs {EverydayComparison1}.
Or {EverydayComparison2}.
My guess?
{Niche} is going to eventually overtake {ComparableIndustry1} the same way {Niche} overtook {ComparableIndustry2}.
And at this rate, that will probably happen by {Date}.
What do you think? Do you agree? Disagree?
Let me know in the comments.

{WrongAdvice}
But then I‚Äôd watch them struggle to make progress in their own lives.
A big part of success is going in a different direction.
And remember: if it was easy, everyone would do it.
